website_summaries.verdict: These glossy gift bags come in a variety of solid colors, making them ideal for year round use. An affordable set of gift bags for average sized items.
pros: Glossy finish with a barely there print is classy and versatile
Roomy enough for medium size gifts or party favors
Holds a decent amount of weight
Available in rose gold, gold, and silver
Set sizes range from 5 to 12, making them ideal for events
cons: No rigid insert at the base
May not be the best option for heavier gifts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift Bags
customer_reviews.text: I bought the pink bags & they were EXACTLY what I wanted. Small & rosegold! I used this for my bridesmaid proposals & it held a robe, champagne flute & mini wine w/o a problem. I recommend this product 100%. I added the ribbon & it was the perfect touch!
customer_reviews.author: Itzamar Llamas

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE. Not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Great color and fabric, but I ordered the red and did not get the design pictured, which is floral pattern that could be used all year round. What I got is an obvious CHRISTMAS print of ornamental hearts on strings, like xmas ornaments. It's too much of a hassle to return, but I'm really disappointed and so sick of Amazon sellers who misrepresent their products.
customer_reviews.author: ErichaZann

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful for rose gold lovers
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and durable bags. I bought them as gift bags for my bachelorette party, they were perfect size for all the goodies I had to put in them. The bags worked great and everyone loved them.
customer_reviews.author: HaileyyMariee

customer_reviews.title: The bag rips easily. I brought several and we had a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag rips easily. I brought several and we had a couple rips on the first day of us. Disappointing,
customer_reviews.author: Caterina Rando

customer_reviews.title: IMPRESSED!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I’m beyond impressed! One of these bags were used for my granddaughters birthday gifts. She adored the “prettiness” of it, so did everyone actually. So very sturdy. Definitely well worth the price paid. These can be reused over and over. They’d be great for presenting gifts, using as a quick inexpensive tote. I don’t think I’d put really heavy things in this, like canned goods though. It definitely would NOT fall apart but it would bow at the bottom. Very well made and I will be buying more! Love these!
customer_reviews.author: ChefKat

customer_reviews.title: Extremely shiny and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely better than expected! It is super shiny 😍 I bought it for my bridesmaid proposals, I am giving a bunch of tiny goods such as a mini bottle of champagne, a diamond pen, a gold portrait frame, a bracelet in its own box, a personalized mirror, among other stuff. I couldn't find a box with the size that I needed so I opted to find better options and I run with this product which is perfect for me! Plus I am traveling with the bags on my luggage so it will definitely won't get ruined like a box or paper bag would have. I might just add a bow to make it look nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Maru Buehler

customer_reviews.title: Good for wedding welcome bags
customer_reviews.text: Cute Bags. I am going to use them for welcome bags for guests who are staying in the hotel for my wedding next month. They should be reusable for the guests as well. I don't think you could put heavy groceries in there, but light things would fit just fine. They don't look/feel too cheap either, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bags, superior quality! Very roomy and can accommodate large gifts. I used tuem to created swag bags for a women's function; they were a big hit. These are also durable enough to be resuable! Wish this bag came in assorted colors. Would be excellent for holiday gifting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but still worked.
customer_reviews.text: Another great buy! The bags were a little smaller than pictured but I was still able to put small gifts in them. A small cross body purse would be the largest gift item that would comfortably fit in this bag. I wish the bags were a little bigger but for what you get, it is definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bralyn J. Ladson

customer_reviews.title: Yes I’ll keep buying this product
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these . Of course I use them as gift bags some I decorate the artist in me others I leave plain I always use very colorful tissue paper and curling ribbons. Everyone who has received one from me has loved them kept them and used them for giving a gift I know of one that has been through 6 gift giving.
customer_reviews.author: bobbie z.

customer_reviews.title: Glossy
customer_reviews.text: Nice color. Material sturdier than anticipated. Main concern for me is that the bad don’t stay open. There was no inserts or things to stuffin the bitten or have the bags sit upright alone.
customer_reviews.author: carmona

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to use for gifts ( erin condren life planners and accessories). when I first opened the package I was slightly dismayed...then I started loading them up, and they are amazing! They hold way more than I thought they would without tearing. One of the bags had a small nick at the top, but I don’t think anyone will notice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and classy bags!
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are nice. I used them as gift favors for a sweet 16 party. They were worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Southern Belle

customer_reviews.title: Better than paper gift bag..reusable
customer_reviews.text: The bags are great gift bags if you want something a little more substantial than a paper gift bag. On the down side, one of the five bags had a big cut down the front of the bag. Thank goodness I only need 4.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Pissed
customer_reviews.text: I am very bothered. I have been with Amazon for a long time and I feel ripped off. I was watching these reuseable bags for a while and to see that there was a better deal for a larger quantity. I am so pissed off. I could have ordered the same bags in sliver a 12 pkgs for the same price. Crazy
customer_reviews.author: aneesha

customer_reviews.title: I only got 4
customer_reviews.text: I like these bags a lot so far. They seem like the perfect thing to liven up a gift but I ordered a 5 pack of the pink ones and only received 4. I'm disappointed cause I needed all 5 and don't have time to order more. The bags are super cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Keely

customer_reviews.title: Sparkle and function
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my niece’s bridal shower game gifts. The color went perfect with our theme and is something that can be used after.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Fun cute bags!
customer_reviews.text: The handles are a little smaller then expected they, but they are cute and worked for what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Lildolfin

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful bags perfect for packing up all of the bride and grooms things after the wedding
customer_reviews.author: annette

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My girls loved them! I’m glad that they can re use them again for the future. It was bigger than I d expected but perfect size for my girls. It was able to hold bunch of stuff inside and the girls loved it when I handed it out at the rehearsal dinner!
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: ... were a little smaller then i thought but that’s fine. Im using them for my bridesmaids gifts
customer_reviews.text: These were a little smaller then i thought but that’s fine. Im using them for my bridesmaids gifts. I wanted something nicer then a regular paper gift bag but less pricey then getting them all totes that they won’t ever use again. This was a happy medium! I’ll attach a photo when I officially use them
customer_reviews.author: Page Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and durable for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! Bought them for brides maids gift bags and they are perfect. Very sturdy and durable for the price - a great value
customer_reviews.author: James Brown

customer_reviews.title: I love the reusable bags
customer_reviews.text: I love the reusable bags. Some are cheap looking and made, but these are professionally made. I believe my gift recipients loved the bag as much as the gift inside.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good gift bags.
customer_reviews.text: Wedding hotel block gift bags. Good quality and match the wedding color. Not grocery durable, but great to hold some weight .
customer_reviews.author: ShuLong

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The bags were beautiful. Used them for Christmas bags. All my friends loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: and they are great! Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use as bridesmaids bags, and they are great! Super cute, lightweight, and well-made. For the price, it's a bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Houston

customer_reviews.title: Pink
customer_reviews.text: The bags are pretty. Just beware this is not a plain pink bag. It has a white design on it. I didn't notice it when I first ordered but will make the best of it for my wedding party
customer_reviews.author: Charisse Young

customer_reviews.title: Love these for gifts
customer_reviews.text: Love these for gifts. I just put a gift inside one and gave it to a neighbor. They got two gifts in one. They are really pretty too.
customer_reviews.author: Saved by Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: At about $2 apiece these are a terrific value. The textile is way better than its paper counterparts. I had no issues with quality at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but smells
customer_reviews.text: My only problem with it was it smelled really bad when I got it, but I got the smell out by airing them out outside and then placing soap in them.
customer_reviews.author: Carlie Snodgrass

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! They are very pretty and sturdy. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kline

customer_reviews.title: Useful and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: We used this ones for a bachelorette party at the beach, we put their names on! Very useful and inexpensive! Love them! they are like “ water resitant to drops of water” ..
customer_reviews.author: Syb

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was fast and arrived in enough time for my event.
customer_reviews.text: This product was just what bi was looking for. It is something that I will use for everyday or an event. The quality was great and very durable. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Brown

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I pretty satiywith the quality. They made great gift bags for my cruise guest. Would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: 3 out of the 5 bags were bent during packaging leaving a permanent line on the bag. There was not enough time to return/re-order it so I was only able to give away the 2 that were ok.

customer_reviews.title: So pretty !
customer_reviews.text: These were the best bags ! I used them for my bachelorette party and they were amazing !!!

customer_reviews.text: I got these for my bridesmaids. They're nice little totes

customer_reviews.text: Used it for my gifts for bridesmaids. Reusable- they were great.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Can take if things inside too heavy, but beautiful convenient great for small- medium gift giving

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Reuseable
customer_reviews.text: I used these bags for my sons wedding as hotel welcome bags. The guests loved that they were something they could reuse. And they’re very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: gerrie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item and good selling point. The perfect size reusable bags!
customer_reviews.author: HJT9p5

customer_reviews.title: FUN, STRONG, FUNCTIONAL, WITHOUT BEING GROCERY BAGS!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for high-end gift bags! Unlike the other bags I ordered, these DO NOT look like slighlty-glorified grocery bags! They are fun, strong, and perfect for bride's maid's bags, birthday gift bags, and "congratulations, you rock" bags that I used them for! Love the fact that they really do stand up by themselves without having to keep track of a silly piece of plastic at the bottom. I love the size, the feel, and the function! We filled them to the brim with a hardcover book, socks, nail polish, mascara, a large box of candy, a cool travel mug, gloves, and more! Buy these, they are so fun!
customer_reviews.author: Danasmith

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bags, I bought them in every color available. I was mad that the pink would not get to me in time. They were study but did not look like a bag you would go and buy groceries to go in it. It was a very classy looking bag and I ordered them two times for two different events that I had.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect besides the smell
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave it a 4 was do to the weird smell they have when you get them. I aired them out and had to spray perfume on them to get the smell to go away. I used them as gift bags for my maid of Honor and my bridesmaids. They were perfect bags.
customer_reviews.author: Kalee Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Keep them in my car for the times I am in the city of Chicago (Live in the suburbs but work in the city) and use them for grocery items since you have to pay for plastic bags. Sturdy and they are super cute
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Nice as a gift bag
customer_reviews.text: On March first, the grocery stores will be charging for bags. I m not paying for them. I have my own colorful, sturdy,and reusable bags! These bags can be used as a gift bag, they are too pretty !!!
customer_reviews.author: Vonnie from Valley Stream, New York

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and unique bag
customer_reviews.text: Sturdier and better quality than I expected. Everyone who's received a gift in it, has loved the bag and kept it to reuse.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great. I bought for birthday present bags and they were a big hit since they are reusable. Cute too!

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I had some heavy and some small gifts for each guest @ Christmastime. These bags were perfect as they were sturdy enough and large enough to hold everything. The handles were sturdy and held up nicely. I would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
